scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Calendar_EventList_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
$core_v2_page.AddLink('stylesheet', $core_v2_widget.GetExecutedFileUrl('style.less'), "%{ Position = 'AfterTheme' }") #set($viewType = $core_v2_widget.GetStringValue("viewType", "upcoming")) #if ($viewType == 'calendar')
#registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.Calendar.widgets.eventList') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end #else $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('is-sidebar.vm') #if($isInSidebar) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile("subview-perform-query.vm") $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('sidebar.vm') #else $core_v2_ui.PagedContent('callback-listevents.vm') $core_v2_ui.Pager($events.PageIndex, $events.PageSize, $events.TotalCount) #end #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="CF_Title" defaultValue="${resource:Calendar_EventList_Title}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="viewType" labelResourceName="ViewType" defaultValue="upcoming" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="upcoming" labelResourceName="UpcomingEvents" orderNumber="1000000" propertiesToHide="status" propertiesToShow="maxMonths,maxEvents" /> <propertyValue value="myevents" labelResourceName="MyEvents" orderNumber="1000001" propertiesToShow="status,maxMonths,maxEvents" /> <propertyValue value="calendar" labelResourceName="View_Calendar" orderNumber="1000002" propertiesToHide="status,maxMonths" propertiesToShow="maxEvents" /> </property> <property id="status" labelResourceName="Status" defaultValue="Confirmed" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="Confirmed" labelResourceName="Confirmed" /> <propertyValue value="Cancelled" labelResourceName="Cancelled" /> <propertyValue value="Invited" labelResourceName="Invited" /> <propertyValue value="NotApproved" labelResourceName="NotApproved" /> </property> <property id="maxMonths" labelResourceName="calendar_EventLinks_MaxMonths" defaultValue="3" dataType="Int" /> <property id="maxEvents" labelResourceName="calendar_EventLinks_MaxEvents" defaultValue="5" dataType="Int" /> <property id="selectedCalendarOrGroup" labelResourceName="calendar_SelectGroupAndCalendar" dataType="Custom" template="calendar_v1_calendarLookup" width="95%" maxCalendarSelections="20" includeCurrentGroup="True" format="csv" /> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="calendar_Edit">Edit</resource> <resource name="calendar_EventLinks_MaxEvents">Events to show</resource> <resource name="calendar_EventLinks_MaxMonths">Months to show</resource> <resource name="Calendar_EventList_Description">Displays list of calendar events</resource> <resource name="Calendar_EventList_Name">Event Calendar - Event List</resource> <resource name="Calendar_EventList_Title">Upcoming Events</resource> <resource name="calendar_SelectGroupAndCalendar">Select group/calendar to pull content from</resource> <resource name="Cancelled">Cancelled</resource> <resource name="CF_Title">Widget Title</resource> <resource name="Clear">Clear...</resource> <resource name="Confirmed">Confirmed</resource> <resource name="EventsOn">Events on {0}</resource> <resource name="Invited">Invited</resource> <resource name="MyEvents">My Events</resource> <resource name="NoData">No upcoming events were found.</resource> <resource name="NoData_Date">No events occur on {0}.</resource> <resource name="NoData_Date_Link">No events occur on {0}. Be the first to <a href="{1}">add an event</a>.</resource> <resource name="NoData_Link">No upcoming events were found. Be the first to <a href="{0}">add an event</a>.</resource> <resource name="NoData_Upcoming">No events occur after {0}.</resource> <resource name="NoData_Upcoming_Link">No events occur after {0}. Be the first to <a href="{1}">add an event</a>.</resource> <resource name="NotApproved">NotApproved</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> <resource name="Status">Registration Status</resource> <resource name="to">to</resource> <resource name="UpcomingEvents">Events</resource> <resource name="View">View</resource> <resource name="View_Calendar">Synchronize with calendar on the same page</resource> <resource name="ViewType">View Type</resource> </language>
